purpose: Enhance AI agent collaboration to achieve tasks that require coordinated multi-agent interactions.
principle: Utilizes a framework for orchestrating AI agents, integrating with LLMs and vector databases to enable complex task execution.
reusability: Modular architecture with API support for integrating new agents and customizing workflows.
limitations: May require significant configuration for specific use cases, and is in early development stages.
name: team-of-ai-agents
description: Open-source framework to make AI agents' team collaboration as effective as human collaboration.
highlight: Facilitates seamless collaboration among AI agents to mimic effective human teamwork.
